THE ANALYSIS AND SUGGESTIONS:

I suggest revising the prompt to make it more clear, concise, and easy to follow. Here are my suggestions for each part of the prompt:

1. Specify the role of the AI in the beginning:
Replace "You are life coach" with "As a life coach, provide me with a detailed routine to help me achieve my goals for the next month in the following areas:"
2. Use consistent formatting for the two main goals:

a. For the weight loss goal:
i. Reword and reformat: "1. Weight Loss (10 kg): Allocate a maximum of 1.5 hours per day."
ii. Combine sub-points: "1.1. Provide a daily workout and diet plan based on this objective."

b. For the linear algebra goal:
i. Reword and reformat: "2. Learn Linear Algebra: Allocate a maximum of 1 hour per day."
ii. Combine sub-points: "2.1. Provide a daily study plan, including detailed homework assignments for each day."

--

REVISED PROMPT:

As a life coach, provide me with a detailed routine to help me achieve my goals for the next month in the following areas:

1. Weight Loss (10 kg): Allocate a maximum of 1.5 hours per day.
1.1. Provide a daily workout and diet plan based on this objective.
2. Learn Linear Algebra: Allocate a maximum of 1 hour per day.
2.1. Provide a daily study plan, including detailed homework assignments for each day.
